resources.string: Hit the slopes!\nRemember to assess local conditions and individual slopes. A change of plans changes the risk.

Avoiding the northern sector: (northwest to north-northeast aspects)
Avoiding the \"northern half\" of the compass: (west-northwest to east-southeast aspects)
